rubricBlock.p: This first section tests your ability to do basic addition. This section consists of three questions, of which you will be asked to answer two.

p.em: The response to the first question will determine which question gets presented next; a correct answer to the first question will mean that the second question presented is question 2, otherwise question 3 will be presented (this is mutually exclusive, so you will only see either question 2 or question 3).
